name: powershell_executor
description: Execute PowerShell commands on the host system and return stdout, stderr, and exit code. Supports piping large content via stdin_data to avoid quoting limits.

command.description: The PowerShell command to run. Avoid interactive prompts.

stdin_data.description: Optional text to send to the command's standard input. Use this for large or multi-line payloads and read it inside PowerShell via $input or [Console]::In.

timeout.description: Seconds to wait before forcefully stopping the command. Defaults to 60.

working_directory.description: Optional directory path where the command should run.
